sect2.title: Contents of Textutils
sect2.para: The Textutils package contains several file manipulation and text processing programs.

sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: cat, cksum, comm, csplit, cut, expand, fmt, fold, head, join, md5sum, nl, od, paste, pr, ptx, sort, split, sum, tac, tail, tr, tsort, unexpand, uniq and wc
